name: Focused Shot
summary: You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.
description:
You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy. Make a ranged weapon Strike against a target within your weapon's first range increment. This Strike ignores the target's concealed condition and all cover.Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.
